sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个情景让我想起了小时候。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège qíngjǐng ràng wǒ xiǎngqǐ le xiǎoshíhou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette scène me rappelle mon enfance.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This scene reminds me of my childhood.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiǎoshíhou jiālǐ hěn qióng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa famille était très pauvre quand il était petit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His family was very poor when he was young.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn lèi, què hái zài gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est très fatigué, mais il travaille encore.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very tired, yet he is still working.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 春节的时候街上很热闹。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūnjié de shíhou jiēshang hěn rènao.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pendant le Nouvel An chinois, les rues sont très animées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: During the Spring Festival, the streets are very lively.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huǒ zài ránshāo zhe.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le feu est en train de brûler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The fire is burning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gèzi hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est très grand.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very tall.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gè hěn lǎoshi de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne très honnête.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a very honest person.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè hěn rèxīn de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne très chaleureuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a very warm-hearted person.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 汽车需要燃料才能行驶。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qìchē xūyào ránliào cái néng xíngshǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La voiture a besoin de carburant pour rouler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A car needs fuel to run.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 其余的人都已经离开了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qíyú de rén dōu yǐjīng líkāi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les autres sont déjà partis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The rest of the people have already left.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rújīn kējì fāzhǎn hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De nos jours, la technologie se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Nowadays technology develops quickly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 父母要培养孩子的好习惯。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fùmǔ yào péiyǎng háizi de hǎo xíguàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les parents doivent cultiver les bonnes habitudes de leurs enfants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Parents should cultivate good habits in their children.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ dì sǎo yīxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez balayer le sol.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sweep the floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个消息的来源可靠吗？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiāoxi de láiyuán kěkào ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La source de cette information est-elle fiable ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is the source of this news reliable?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shēntǐ bǐjiào ruò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a une santé plutôt fragile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His health is relatively weak.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàyǔ le, jìde dài sǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pleut, n'oublie pas de prendre un parapluie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's raining, remember to bring an umbrella.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhèngzài shēnqǐng qiānzhèng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis en train de demander un visa.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am applying for a visa.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì gōngsī de nèibù xiāoxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une information interne de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is internal company information.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn shànyú yǔ rén gōutōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est très douée pour communiquer avec les gens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is good at communicating with people.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shàng gè yuè wǒ qù le Shànghǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le mois dernier, je suis allé à Shanghai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Last month I went to Shanghai.
